cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Account_Set.name: cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Account_Set__c
cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Account_Set.description: Junction object between Job Definition List and Customer Set.

cgcloud__Composite_Key__c.description: Contains concatenation of the related records' Job definition List and Customer Set. The field is set by workflow. This prevents a Customer Set from being added twice to a Job Definition List.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales Organization to which the account set assignment of the activity (and the activity itself) belongs.
